channel.title: Saving Problem, help appreciated
channel.description: I've been trying for ages, and I can't seem to fix this stupid saving bug. I log in, and then wait like 5 minutes, and log out, and it doesn't save, even when it is auto-save, I always get this message, Cannot save for (playername here) and it's anoying me so badly! It's go t the stage it's wrecked a good day of racing :(

item.title: Saving Problem, help appreciated
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

I’ve been trying for ages, and I can’t seem to fix this stupid saving bug.
I log in, and then wait like 5 minutes, and log out, and it doesn’t save, even when it is auto-save, I always get this message, Cannot save for (playername here) and it’s anoying me so badly! It’s go t the stage it’s wrecked a good day of racing

Read full topic
